procedure.name: ReadRecord
procedure.statement: SELECT field0 FROM USERTABLE WHERE YCSB_KEY=?
SELECT field2, field4 FROM USERTABLE WHERE YCSB_KEY=?
SELECT field1, field2, field3 FROM USERTABLE WHERE YCSB_KEY=?
SELECT field1, field2, field6, field7 FROM USERTABLE WHERE YCSB_KEY=?
SELECT field0, field1, field5, field8, field9 FROM USERTABLE WHERE YCSB_KEY=?

procedure.name: ScanRecord
procedure.statement: SELECT * FROM USERTABLE WHERE YCSB_KEY > ? AND YCSB_KEY < ?

procedure.name: UpdateRecord
procedure.statement: UPDATE USERTABLE SET FIELD0=?, FIELD1=?,FIELD2=?,FIELD3=?,FIELD4=?,FIELD5=?,FIELD6=?,FIELD7=?,FIELD8=?,FIELD9=? WHERE YCSB_KEY=?

procedure.name: ReadModifyWriteRecord
procedure.statement: Select * from USERTABLE where YCSB_KEY=? FOR UPDATE
